detail_desc: Short cycling shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
A-line blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.

Bra in soft microfibre with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the back to hold the bra in place. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Cropped vest top in ribbed jersey with metal press-studs down the front.

Body in microfibre and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top and short, narrow shoulder straps. Lace trim around the armholes.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Short-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Satin dance shoes with elastication around the openings and crossover elastic straps at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and suede soles.
Top in stretch viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck with a gathered seam down the front for a draped effect and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, and covered elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reflective details. Fleece lining. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in sturdy fabric with a low waist, laser-cut edges and high cut at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. Short, flounced sleeves with smocking over the shoulders, and gathers in the side seams for best fit.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a lightweight, patterned viscose twill with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a narrow, elasticated seam and sewn-on tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, seamless yoga shorts in fast-drying fabric with a ribbed waistband. The shorts are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and visible elastication at the hem.
Dressing gown in soft, gently draping satin with a sheen. Lace at the top, a yoke at the back and short sleeves with lace trims. Wrapover front with concealed ties inside and a tie belt at the waist.
All-in-one suit in soft pile with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked seam at the waist. Lined skirt.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative, sewn-on knot detail at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Bikini briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a rounded collar and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets. Lined.
Leather belt with a seam and metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Headband knitted in soft cashmere with a wrapover front.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, deep V-neck and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede court shoes with open sides and pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Dungaree shorts in a soft organic cotton double weave with adjustable straps and buttons at the sides. Kangaroo pocket at the front, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in an airy, organic cotton weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short, wide raglan sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck with a wrapover front and an opening with ties at the back.
Calf-length skirt in tulle with embroidery and fabric floral appliqués. Elasticated waistband and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.

Long, voluminous dress in taffeta with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck front and back and concealed zip in one side. Skirt with gathered tiers for added width and volume. Lined bodice. The polyester content of the dress’s outer fabric is recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck at the back with crossover straps.
Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-in creases at the front and a zip and concealed button at one side.
Short, fitted T-shirt in soft fabric with a round neckline.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.

Trousers in nylon with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, a back pocket with a concealed zip and mesh-lined leg pockets with a flap and concealed zip. Small, reflective motif on one leg and an elasticated drawstring at the hems. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in a lightly crêped weave with a double-layered shawl collar and a deep V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Shoulder pads and puff sleeves with padding at the top to create a defined silhouette, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the waist, and a seam at the waist with pleats front and back. Satin lining.

Textile marker that allows you to decorate your fabric odds and ends and give them a unique and personal design. Add some style to your canvas trainers, fabric bag or T-shirt. Available in several colours. How to use: 1. Let the marker do the work and allow your creativity to flow. 2. Leave the ink to set for at least 24 hours so that it is totally fixed and wash-proof. 3. Can’t wait for 24 hours? Iron it.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Satin skirt with an elasticated paper bag waist, tie belt and side pockets.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short imitation suede jacket with imitation leather details. Large pile collar with double tabs, a diagonal zip at the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with pleats at the top and an opening with press-studs at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a slit at the front. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.
Calf-length dress in softly draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide A-line skirt. Lined over the bust.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
3/4-length, lightweight sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with a zip in one side and wedge heels. Faux fur linings and insoles, and sturdy fluted soles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm. Heel approx. 4.5 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs and two flap chest pockets with a button. Yoke at the back and a rounded hem.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Shorts woven in a viscose blend with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and short legs. Unlined.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft piqué made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Long dress in an airy weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with a small opening and tie detail at the top. Concealed zip in one side and a seam below the bust with pleats to create width in the skirt. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg.
Short skirt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with belt loops at the waist and a zip down the front. Lined.
